author: timbeiko
content: Yes, we will likely discuss that tomorrow <@456226577798135808>. The most important thing is for the actual work to be done and to have time to test, so I don't want to commit us to blocks which we'll have to change because we don't have enough time for proper testing, hence the three possible schedules.
